name: fabricator
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who invents or produces something false in order to deceive someone: He’s an admitted plagiarist and fabricator. She will fight to prove that she is not a fabricator.
especially US a person or company that produces a product, especially in an industrial process: metal fabricator My father was a metal fabricator. Operators, fabricators, and labourers are the occupations that suffered the most injuries. See
fabricate
More examplesFewer examplesThe man was a well-known fabricator of information.Authorities dismissed as an out-and-out fabricator.The designs will be made available to semiconductor fabricators.
